website_summaries.verdict: A versatile range hood that delivers impressive performance and sports the latest smart technology by Samsung.
pros: Pairs nicely with both traditional and contemporary kitchen decor
390 CFM combined with dual motors and steam eliminate tough cooking odors without being too loud
cons: Relatively more expensive, but you are paying for a top of the line model from one of the leading brands in the industry

customer_reviews.title: The Good and the Bad
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful under cabinet range hood PS10. It does have professional performance when pulling smoke and grease out of the kitchen. However, the clock only has military time and there is no way to set the clock differently. I prefer regular time. Also, there is a problem with the clock running extremely fast. It has gained 27 minutes in 3 weeks. If it had not already been installed, I would return it because of the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Display has issue after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The vent good works well. I was unsure of the grease buffer first since it looks like it would block the air suction but it actually does not interfere and the air flow and looks good since you don't see the fan opening. However, within 2 weeks of installation the display already Has issue. The digital clock already has a burned out. I'm hoping nothing else go wrong as time goes on. Not sure how the display can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Doitteau

customer_reviews.title: After use 2 month the digital clock looks like that missing a line already
customer_reviews.text: After use 2 month the digital clock looks like that missing a line already. But so far the mechanical working OK.
customer_reviews.author: Lanji74

customer_reviews.title: The range hood is great, but the self clean function does not work
customer_reviews.text: Beware, these hood and range do not last. Vent funcitonality and clean functionality have failed a few weeks of light use. The Fans make a grumble noise and the clean function does not work. The single person who runs Holloway Trade doesn‘t respond at all, and no help from manufactuer. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Na Penn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent range hood
customer_reviews.text: Excellent range hood, very weighty, huge CFM, which I need because we cook many types of Asian food. When your bed sheets smell like Pad Thai, it's time to bump up to a better model of vent. This does the job-and as a bonus it cleans itself. Very pleased. This hood is the bomb! Best purchase I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product!
customer_reviews.text: It says brand new but has a dent on top right corner when I opened the package. Also, it’s quite noisy even at lowest level. Clock goes 4 minute faster in 24 hours. I rather spend a little more to get a better range hood in a long run. I wont purchase “CHEF” hood range again.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Du

customer_reviews.title: 24 Hour Clock Only & Runs Way Fast
customer_reviews.text: Have had this fan installed for about a month now. The fan is great at removing smoke and odors. But, be forewarned that the clock in the hood cannot be set to use AM/PM instead of the 24 hour clock. The clock does not maintain the time accurately either. I set the clock 2 weeks ago and as of today it is running 16 minutes fast.
customer_reviews.author: Randy J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Stylish range hood with self clean function
customer_reviews.text: I have had this range hood for almost 3 months. I actually compared it with lots of other brands at different prices range. At this price range, this ine has the most functions and very stylish. I saw some of the previous reviews told that the clock wont show normally after some time. Mines is good till now. The sunction power is good just the noise would be loud when you adjust it to the highest level. There are 6 levels that you can choose. Basically I LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Chow

customer_reviews.title: Good Cooktop Range, Lights are bright
customer_reviews.text: Venting is good, multiple speeds, seems to be working well. Lights are bright and touchpad so far works well, we will see how it holds up based on other reviews. Only issue I had is that the adaptor to connect to your venting is somewhat short and barely poked though my cabinet base and was hard to get the venting to attach to it. Less than a 1/4 inch of it was able to be mounted to so it need some good ducting tape. Maybe that's just my house but this was a standard set of cabinets. Other than that, works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: C2Computer

customer_reviews.title: Relatively quiet and very effective.
customer_reviews.text: Looks fabulous. Excellent suction. Not too loud on highest setting, pretty quiet on lowest setting. Nice lights and free clear how to install. Love the steam clean feature. Installation tip: draw on paper where the rear mounting holes should be drilled, staple got to the back of your cabinets and drill the holes that way. Then when installing the cabinets what's today rear of the cabinet through the two holes and then while the cabinet is being held up, screw in the front mounting
customer_reviews.author: KyleL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Exhaust hood. More than expected,worth of price.
customer_reviews.text: What a Hood Exhaust. Must say more than expectations. Its been more than month now. I must say its really good one. I did my whole kitchen renovate and Making everyday indian food with spicies I was worried about having durable good quality hood exhaust with higher CFMs. Have to say so far we hardly went up higher speed from three speed selector. The lower speed is more than enough and didn't needed higher speed so far. Definitely recommend this one. ONLY ONE THING ITS VERY HEAVY AND NEED TWO PERSON TO INSTALL. But im happy after installing.
customer_reviews.author: NY User

customer_reviews.title: Get the next model down.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Chef product purchase and was shipped damaged by UPS. Amazon were awesome about returning it. However, this model is not as good looking as the next model down which I purchased as a replacement, and appears to be more difficult to clear than the next model down (which has the two baffle plates instead of the side intake baffles). I would recommend going with the next model down, which I have installed now and love.
customer_reviews.author: jasond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Asian cooking
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for several months now and can say that this was a great purchase. I no longer have to worry about any smells upstairs after cooking. I've tried using my wok as well and the kitchen is free of smoke. I'm thoroughly impressed. It is not loud on high for the amount of air it moves. It is pretty heavy, but I was able to install it myself using a cabinet jack. You just have to buy 2 boards, one to set the cabinet jack on top of the stove and the other for the hood to sit on. I have not experienced any problems with the LCD that others have reported.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Reliable
customer_reviews.text: The fans do a decent job of sucking up the fumes and steam vapors even at medium settings. The noise level is bearable if you don't need to run the fan motors at the higher settings too often. The Auto-Clean function on mine quit working after 1 year and 7 months. Taking the whole thing apart for a thorough cleaning is not complicated but you do need to be careful not to get cut on the sheet metal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Chan

customer_reviews.title: The fans are powerful and does a good job removing odor
customer_reviews.text: The fans are powerful and does a good job removing odor. However, after two weeks of installation, the LED display starts to act up and some of the digits for the clock is missing parts on the display. So the number "0" now looks like an "n", which make you wonder what else might go wrong later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I really ordered this just because I like the way it looks. Also, I hate kitchen odors to linger in the house. We really hit the jackpot with this exhaust fan. I don't know how anything so powerful can be so quiet. But it is! It was NOT easy to install, however.
customer_reviews.author: M. Colee

customer_reviews.title: Returning 2nd unit.  QC not inspiring confidence.
customer_reviews.text: First unit had bad bearing, warped panels, a bit of corrosion. Second unit's transformer fell out before even getting to installing. These look like TIG spot welds. 4 spots and none held at all. I dunno if I'll ever try another. Steel seems a little think, and on the cheap side of ... what, 400 series ferritic stainless? I detect a bit of corrosion on both units. That said, when it's not broken, its fairly quite and moves a lot of air. Combined with the LEDs dying complaints, I'm not sure I'll be willing to loose many hours to give it another shot.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: ... hood looks fantastic in my kitchen and works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: The hood looks fantastic in my kitchen and works flawlessly for now. The sucking power is great, according to my wife. I have no ideas how to verify that power, 950 cfm. Well, if my lady happy, then I am happy. 5-Stars for customer service. I took off one star because of packaging was not adequately protected, IMO. My last hood was Pacific, that lasted me for more than 18 years. I'll see how long this one last.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: VERY POWERFUL! No louder than our old microwave, but a much smoother, more pleasant sound. No mounting template is provided. The mounting instructions seem detailed at first, but the measurements are wrong. Good thing I'm pretty DIY savvy and double checked the measurements. Once we got those right, install was pretty easy. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Yeh

customer_reviews.title: A damaged unit was received even no dent on packing cardboard box, watch out the QA/QC issue
customer_reviews.text: Based on the specifications of the Chef PS10 30", the product fits my budget and application well when remodel the kitchen by contractor. When the hood was arrived, the package looked fine, so, didn't open the box and check the hood when received. I was informed when the contractor doing the installation, I had to spend more than quite a few hundred dollars more to purchase a range hood at local store for contractor to finish the installation. The hood was returned and refund by Amazon, a bad experience with the Chef Range Hood.
customer_reviews.author: Ching-Lai Hoh

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. It's been over two years and it works perfectly. Self-cleaning feature is great. I love the fan. For the most part, we go to Level 2 to get rid of the steam, but even with Level 2, it works perfectly. In last two years, we barely had to go to Fan speed of or 4 one or two times. Very useful product. I event recommended my friends to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: ViKavi

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful suction!
customer_reviews.text: I've always used vent hoods that were mediocre. This vent hood is the most powerful I have installed in my home. I do a lot of wok cooking and searing in cast iron pan and this hood does the job! Im sure there are others with more powerful suction but this one more than meets expectations!
customer_reviews.author: empl

customer_reviews.title: Love the delay auto shutoff feature that let me leave ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful at 950 cfm and quite at the lowest level (1 of 6 speed settings). Touch control panel display looks elegant. Love the delay auto shutoff feature that let me leave it on for 15 min. max. The 3-minute steam cleaning does save a lot of time. Now I can clean it without having to dismantle a lot of parts. Great range hood! Need 2 persons to install
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great range hood from Tatsumaki /Chef Kitch
customer_reviews.text: Great range hood from Tatsumaki /Chef Kitch. I bought this to replace my KitchenAid under cabinet range hood due to its weak ventilation power. Chef Kitch hood is beautifully designed and works completely as advertised. The fan produces satisfactory suction power for even heavy cooking and yet operates quietly even at high speed. I have already recommend this hood to a few friends.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: completely satisfied with choice
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent range hood. I feel like I spent weeks researching which range hood to buy. When I finally tried to order this range hood, it was out of stock. I emailed Tatsumaki and they were very responsive and let me know when it would be in stock again. They were also able to assure me that the LCD issue reported in early models had been resolved. I've now had the hood installed for around 9 months and it has performed flawlessly. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B. Haislip

customer_reviews.title: If this were more quiet, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Every thing is good about this range hood: - Good looking - Easy to use - Install is easy except for 1 thing that some of other range hood can do is that it's a bit noisy, it's not too bad compare to others but it's not the best out there when it comes to noise. I couldn't give it 5 stars because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan A Le

customer_reviews.title: works very well, very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This Range Hood works very well with its provided suction power options and is also super easy to use. I cook at least 6 out of 7 days of the week and I find it super convenient to use. All you need to do is press the touchscreen power button and click for the suction power you want. Cleaning is also a breeze. I no longer have to manually wash out the oil. This Range Hood has a great feature that cleans itself by just adding soap and water. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Overall, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I heard a lot of good things from my friends about this company. They are correct! The customer service line is always there. They are responsive. Most importantly, the quality of the range hood is top notch! I was doing quite a bit of research on similar products and trying to decide which one to get by specially comparing this model to UC-PS18SS. I ended up choosing this range hood because of the 900 CFM and the round corner which matches my cabinet style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Kitchen Smel
customer_reviews.text: This hood performance extremely good. If you back track the CFM calculation it is a commercial hood calculation and I installed this hood 33 inch from the cook top and performing extremely as advertise. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Dong

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Can’t be five stars for following reasons No installation template I have to make one myself. Instructions are inefficient. Noise is okay not too loud too noisy Duct connector made of plastic Over all is okay product
customer_reviews.author: arleen

customer_reviews.title: This hood fit into the opening better than the first one I tried
customer_reviews.text: I must point out this hood replaced the horrible GE microwave/exhaust hood that came with our new home. The GE didn't microwave well or exhaust the cooking fumes from our gas range. This flaw resulted in our smoke alarm going off frequently which was quite loud.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hood
customer_reviews.text: This hood was to replaced our Pacific hood that broke within a few years. This one is so much better at sucking all the smoke out, keeping my house smelling clean. My husband and I both love to cook, especially Asian food. This is a great buy, hopefully it will last longer than my old one. It will need two people to install, this one is very heavy!
customer_reviews.author: HING MAI

customer_reviews.title: This unit will only show military time.
customer_reviews.text: I like the appearance of the unit for the money. Have not had used it yet as we just put it in our new home currently being built; however I will point out the clock is in 24hour format and is very irritating if you dont operate on military time. I called the 800# and spoke w/ a repair tech who is sending out a control panel that apparently will operate the clock on a 12 hour system. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, great design.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product so far, sucks up air incredibly well due to their bottom plate design, which is due to a scientific effect called the Venturi effect (Google it.) They also have this model with baffles but this vent is more functional at sucking in air than the baffle model. Function over design I guess (although this looks just as good in my opinion.) I just hope the touch screen holds up over time and also hope the company will be there for me with replacement parts if it doesnt hold up.
customer_reviews.author: kvmlk

customer_reviews.title: Powerful hood compared with others of a similar price
customer_reviews.text: I love the suction power 900 CFM it really sucks !! A bit noisy though, may be due to the power. Easy to install. 2 people holding it and a third person bolting.
customer_reviews.author: Kevedo61

customer_reviews.title: came with hot halogen lamps
customer_reviews.text: so far everything about this hood is great, the install was a task but that was from my cabinet config not hood. but box that hood came in said on side 2- LED lamps, well not true, these are some HOT halogens, (putting in LED's tomorrow) just thought online customers should know to plan on buying LED's if they prefer..
customer_reviews.author: S. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, high quality parts and simple to install. Works and looks great! Just wish that led instead of halogen lamps were included, but it is easy to replace them
customer_reviews.author: G K

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Having reviewed several different options, and never hearing of Hauslane before, we took a chance and ordered this... pretty simple to install, great suction power. We will see how this works over time.
customer_reviews.author: Troy D

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great but not easy to install. Contractor took forever to get it in because it doesn’t have screw holes? I don’t know. Something they said. It works great though. Make sure you get a good contractor? Hahha
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: The BEST range hood
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is amazing! I live in a household where the fam is constantly cooking with highly aromatic spices and let me tell you, the scent of those spices will make their way into every corner of the house. Luckily, this range hood is extremely powerful and I literally can’t smell anything when it’s cooking! Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: 🤪

customer_reviews.title: Quality range hood
customer_reviews.text: I can't breathe well smelling cooking odors. Got this installed by professional. It works great if my wife remembers to turn it on. The timer is super easy to set also. Its well made.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This hood is just right . I researched other brands and very happy I chose this Chef model. I wanted a heavy duty stainless with a lot of power and this is perfect.replaced a Vented space saver microwave which never really was powerful to remove smoke and now smoke detectors are silent. NOTE THIS IS A 2 PERSON INSTALl It is heavy but that’s what is good about it High Quality and powerful .also easy to understand instructions but read the entire booklet for important info
customer_reviews.author: john johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The range hood is just what i was looking for. It is as advertised and the order arrive a couple of days ahead of time. It was not a problem to install. it fit as the advertised information stated.
customer_reviews.author: genel

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described. Very quiet and powerful fan ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Very quiet and powerful fan. Although there's no way to verify the 1000cfm but o more fire alarm going off with cooking. The house doesn't smell anymore with this thing on.
customer_reviews.author: Hau Q. Che

customer_reviews.title: (PS 10) not so hard to install, but not easy; great air movement
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit, moves copious amounts of air and looks good doing it! Install was not easy, but managed to do with my just me, my 100lb wife and 12 yr old son. No, not easy, and required an extension for the drill, but we managed it just fine (and I am not a handy-man). Deducted 1 star as the lights are not very bright at all on high. Low is a good level, but not high. not sure I can replace them, but if I can, I'll add another star.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: At this price it is very noisy when the exhaust is more than 50% of its power. Cant hear anyone speaking. If one is to socialize and the dining area is also a part of the kitchen , god forbid talking to ones guest. You will have to shout at each other.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Bad design for install
customer_reviews.text: Very bad design for installation, very difficult to install with a very heavy product, one side of the fan not working, wasted of my time and money, very stupid design to put the outlet cord next to screw hole. Bad return service that customer have to drop the big and heavy item to UPS instead off UPS pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Zhan

customer_reviews.title: Good Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 30" range hood during Amazon Prime day; it's been working fine for two months with my Asian style of cooking. You will need a helper to install this range hood; it took me about 1.5 hours to install partially beacuse I needed to fill up the hollow space under my cabinet. Installation template, which was very helpful, was inlcuded in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lu

customer_reviews.title: Professional who installed has provided good feedback. After few weeks now I am noticing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this range hood recently. I was hoping 950 CFM would help to vent fumes and smokes out of my kitchen.Product does seem to be built well. Professional who installed has provided good feedback.After few weeks now I am noticing LCD is not displaying hours digit .To repair or replace and reinstall would cost time and labor.Now I am worried with this hood as they supposed to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: RSaiBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction and good looks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hood because of the strong fan, steam cleaning and clean looks. Love the design, clean lines, very modern design. The looks are complemented by the performance of the fan. Update after more than an year of use. Still going strong. Love the self cleaning mode. Personal views. Did not receive any compensation from Amazon/ manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: strobe

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck and ended up with defects product and great to have amazon back me up.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one in early September and arrived on time and hired professional to install me, but it only worked for three days. At the morning, it turned it on and off itself a few times and then completely not working. I called the amazon customer service. They are great and get me refund quick and had to order new one. I just hope it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Good hood but a bit loud
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. The install was relatively easy. Suction is good but unit is loud even on the low setting. My unit had the 24 hr clock issue noted in other amazon reviews but I contacted seller and had replacement part within two days. Replacement part was easy to install. Overall satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: hhuppert

customer_reviews.title: Match perfectly with my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I had an Advantum Microwave/Oven which I love very much. Unfortunately, the board for the control was not function any more and discontinued from manufacture. I could not find the part replacement anywhere on the web or manufacture. We was looking for a Microwave/Oven to replace my old one but found this Auto Clean Range hood. The Auto Clean feature really get us sold.
customer_reviews.author: Tung Le

customer_reviews.title: YAY !  Installed and I LOVE it !
customer_reviews.text: I've had this range hood in a box for about a month, and it, and my new range were finally installed Friday. AND I LOVE IT ! I read the reviews - including the statement that the exhaust system would 'suck a turkey off of your stove and deposit it in your back yard'. Yes, it IS that powerful. It looks great and it works as well as advertised. I made sausage and sauerkraut - and my house still smelled like candles (not kraut !!) So happy !
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: misleading
customer_reviews.text: Auto clean feature is hoax. I tried multiple times to get clarification from seller but no luck. I do not see any way to hook the cleaning tray. It's really not worth $400+. Also it's much more louder than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Udai Bhan Kashyap

customer_reviews.title: One of the best range hoods for affordable price while being powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Chef rangehood PS38 is one of the best range hoods, I have bought in a long time. It has a high CFM while keeping the price affordable and cheaper than other range hoods. The only thing I had trouble with was with installation of the hood because of the weight and I didn't have any help. Other than the weight, this range hood is a good hood for affordable price while also being effective.
customer_reviews.author: shaji

customer_reviews.title: Working great and not noise
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome and surprised to me,now when i‘m cooking it don’t have the smell of the food and i‘m very happy about it.And it didn’t make the loud noise, we’re Chinese, it’s really recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ming W.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Small damages internally during shipping but as a whole this is a great product and works very well. Seller is very responsive and sent replacement parts quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is so so !!
customer_reviews.text: This is not strong enough !! When I am cooking I am smelling the food odor still. And the clock is 24 hr. Always runs forward the clock.
customer_reviews.author: marci

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was quieter. But it does what it needs to and that is it sucks the air. The best feature is the Auto Steam clean. Makes it really simple to wipe off the grime. Looks ultra modern and sophisticated. Bought this about a month ago. Hope it holds up well. And yes, you need to put a junction box to plug the unit into.
customer_reviews.author: Jasvinder Singh

customer_reviews.title: Very good product in general
customer_reviews.text: Had not have the chance to install it yet but the overall build quality is excellent and suction power is far more superior compared to home depot brands...
customer_reviews.author: mohanad

customer_reviews.title: Cheap built
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with the product and its cheap built, when i ordred first, one of the fan in the range hood was not working at all .Than i ordred another one for as a replacement and it looks like used but i paid for the new product.
customer_reviews.author: touhiidulbhuiyan

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing range hood. Did a lot of research before buying. This Chef Kitch hood caught my eye, after doing extensive between between this range hood with the competition I decided to try it. It did not disappoint it has awesome power and was easy to install. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely on the louder end but it works amazingly so I really don’t mind. I’ll love egg rolls and I don’t small a think throughout the house. I’m very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Control Panel not communicating with the fan motors
customer_reviews.text: We started to use it since June. Only half year I don’t know why it’s not working anymore. The control panel is still on, light is on. But the fan is not working. Anyone can help us? It’s not a cheap rangehood, I don’t want to spend more money on a replacement. I really like it when it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Zhenyu Lin

customer_reviews.title: First one dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: First one dead on arrival, did a replacement, the second one is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable high CFM exhaust fan.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Sucks a lot of air. Installation was easy. Make sure to get a long Phillip head drive bit.
customer_reviews.author: Thierry H.

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: So far, no issues with this. It was very straightforward to hang up and doesnt make too much noise either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Good suctions and sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: It got good suctions, noise level is good not too loud, sleek looking stainless steel, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Yanarith Ing

customer_reviews.title: Suction is great but we did bump our heads a few time.
customer_reviews.text: This unit sticks out a few more inches than our old unt, so if you are upgrading be careful not to bump your head on the corners. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I am looking for. I looks nice , runs quiet and has good suction power. I also like how easy it is to take the cover off for cleaning .
customer_reviews.author: yen le

customer_reviews.title: GOOD Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good range hood which is easy to install and low noise.
customer_reviews.author: Gnat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this as a surprise gift for my birthday and I love it. It takes out all the smell so my hairs don't smell like food every time after cooking. I notice some customers had issue with the clock but mine is completely fine. Anyway just taking out the smell from my hair and cloth worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Ho

customer_reviews.title: Overall, not an A+
customer_reviews.text: Good transaction. Item ok, but is bip -ing, 2 nights it started to bip with no reason. We can't take the noise out. Every time we have to touch screen we have the noise. And is very hard to start the light. Possible to be an issue with the touch screen .
customer_reviews.author: Vas

customer_reviews.title: Good strong fan and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for almost half a year and it suits all our needs and performs really well! As someone who cooks a lot but doesn't like having the house smell for hours afterwards this range hood solved that problem. It quickly took away the smoke and grease and it's so easy to clean. I'm glad we upgraded to this hood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality price
customer_reviews.text: After comparing with many models this is the best quality and price. My wife is happy with the easy cleaning, just put the filler in dishwashers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, efficient modern looks, powerful suction ability, I will recommend to families who cook a lot like me.
customer_reviews.author: Xuehui Su

customer_reviews.title: Good but had some pieces either broken or missing.
customer_reviews.text: The hood fan is great but the plastic flaps inside were already broken during the shipment. I had to put epoxy on the tabs so it could work again. There was a slight dent on the top and there were screws missing from the top. If any replacement flaps could be sent that would be great.

customer_reviews.title: Chef hood
customer_reviews.text: Had this hood for almost a year. Love it! Not too loud and super powerful. Plus self clean!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product

customer_reviews.text: This extractor is super Amazing. No Grease and no food smell in the house. The only downside is the noise but still its a must buy for its performance.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have it suck!

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks beautiful— a bit loud
customer_reviews.text: It works great and it looks beautiful. A bit loud even at it lowest level. There’s only one setting for the light—I wish I could dim it. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Solid Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Well built and designed unit. It is easy to use. Awesome suction takes smoke and odors out of the kitchen. I strongly recommend this unit if you do a lot of cooking at home. Also, the self cleaning feature works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Luis H

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Product look great and word as advertised. The self clean is very useful. However, just a bit on the heavy size. It took longer than expected fir the installation. Other than the weight it is a great product. Have it for about 2 month now
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Broken part
customer_reviews.text: The left LED LIGHT-3 wires does not work, called customer service, look like from Indian country answer, signal weak and could not hear anything. I just need the LED bulb. Can’t swap with left side to verify, only 2 wires.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and nice customer service
customer_reviews.text: I brought the product year ago. I like the modern style design and its well performance on heavy cook. Customer service was very nice and help me get accessory a year after the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. The levels of power are very useful ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. The levels of power are very useful and the machine itself is extremely powerful. The range hood arrived on time with everything inside the package in perfect condition. Nothing was missing or broken and that was great. Very satisfied with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, has good power
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought it earlier, looks very modern.

customer_reviews.text: I would give it three stars because of the light/bulb problem. One of thme is dead after two months - we used it occasionally only.

customer_reviews.title: It’s awsome

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as advertised. It works great! As a property manager, I'm always looking for great products at reasonable prices. Would definitely purchase it again for future remodel projects.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is much better than my older non-vent hood even at full blast
customer_reviews.text: It works. You can still smell a little bit when cooking, but the smell doesn't linger as much as my original non-vent hood. The sound is much better than my older non-vent hood even at full blast.

customer_reviews.title: This hood is very powerful and must be vented properly, the high setting will not be needed much.
customer_reviews.text: My wife cooks a lot and the tiny recirculating stove vent we had was doing nothing but blowing smoke and grease back into the house. Since adding the 30” Chef Range Hood and venting it outside the house and kitchen stay much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: bruce knight

product_meta.title: Hauslane | Chef Series Range Hood 30" PS38 PRO PERFORMANCE Stainless Steel Slim Under Cabinet Range Hood Design | Steam Auto Clean, Touch Panel | Superior Perimeter Aspiration Extraction
feature_bullets: POWERFUL SUCTION WITH DUAL MOTORS: Prepare all of your favorite meals without worrying about unwanted smells, messy splatters or dangerous fumes.

INNOVATIVE STEAM AUTO CLEAN: Chef’s steam clean function turns water into steam to dissolve cold grease. Once dissolved, water is sprayed to get your range hood completely clean. Improve hygiene while increasing the life of your motor.
BUTTONLESS SLEEK DESIGN: Touch control panel with easy-to-read display screen and digital clock allows you to keep track of your cooking time.
EASY TO CLEAN FILTERS: Chef’s 30in range is designed with easy-to-remove panel filter. Just remove and wipe clean.
BRIGHT LED ILLUMINATION: Chef’s PS38 features two bright LED lamps with a perfect intensity setting to illuminate your culinary needs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars330 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
